entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Missing rude edit when an initializer with internal active statement is deleted #69249
  • Character offset not taken into account in Location.GetMappedLineSpan #69248
  • EnC: support moving fields and properties #69247
  • EnC: default lambda parameters #69246
  • EnC: Inline Arrays #69245
  • Quick Actions don't suggest to import missing namespaces﻿ for source-generated extension methods #69243
  • StringSyntaxAttribute does not work for property assignments in with expressions #69237
  • Missing implementation for inline arrays via collection expression #69236
  • "Navigate To" feature frequently crashes #69234
  • User-defined GetEnumeartor in InlineArray #69232
    17.9
  • Resolve ambiguities and breaking changes due to mismatches introduced with `ref readonly` parameters #69229
    17.8
  • IDE doesn't suggest upgrading LangVersion when emitting error as warning #69228
    Backlog

Closed

  • ref field in InlineArray #69233
    17.8
  • IDE0065 (Using directives must be placed outside of a namespace declaration) for aliases #69251
  • `PENamedTypeSymbol` should override `GetMembersUnordered` with an efficient implementation #69169
    17.8
  • Cancellation token can no longer be passed when using CompilationWithAnalyzersOptions #41522
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround for issues with Uri escaping certain Unicode characters #69253
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude LSP projects from source build #69244
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support the StringSyntax attribute in more cases #69241
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude BCL binaries in Roslyn ServiceHub vsix #69239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid array enumerator allocations in SimpleDiagnostic.Equals #69238
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unify `ref readonly` with `in` parameter behavior where it currently differs #69235
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline array for ReadOnlySpan<T> argument to builder method #69227
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, 17.8
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use consistent failure mode for inline arrays that have unsupported element fields due to different reasons. #69190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Ensure proper definite assignment analysis for an inline array that is not supported by language. #69212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Use unique name for bootstrap artifacts #69250
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update cancellation token handling behavior for certain analyzer APIs #69108
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged, Next
  • Update `ref readonly` parameters feature status #69240
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Merge `features/RefReadonly` into `main` #69230
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, Next
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` parameters in `cref` #69104
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Collection expressions: rename files #69207
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
  • Update "use collection initializer" to use a collection-expression if the user prefers that form. #69219
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only use scoped for ref parameters #69220
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update Concord dependency versions and fix nullability warnings #69195
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix `ref readonly` mismatch retargeting #69205
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Add more `ref readonly` tests and address comments #69183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69214
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check both csc.exe and vbc.exe as filename to exclude #69221
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
